<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Duergar Bombardier](/Monsters.aspx?ID=169)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Alchemy intrigues many duergars, and their cruel traditions often motivate them to experiment on slaves. Eager to inflict pain and justify the abuse as a method of expanding knowledge, duergar bombardiers often accompany slaver bands so they can have the first chance to select their next test subjects from captured victims. To duergar bombardiers, the lob of each bomb represents a new opportunity to observe how their targets react and record the results to enhance future modifications to their alchemical concoctions.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<image src="/images/Monsters/Duergar_DuergarBombardier.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Duergar Bombardier](/Monsters.aspx?ID=169)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Duergar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=53" />
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 139</row>

**Perception** +4; darkvision

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +6, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +4

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** +3

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -1
</row>

**Infused Items** A duergar bombardier’s items listed as infused last for 24 hours, or until the next time they make their daily preparations.

**Items**
[Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5), [infused lesser acid flask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=74) (2), [infused lesser alchemist's fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75) (2), infused reagents (2)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +4 

+2 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 20

**Light Blindness**

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
warhammer +4 ([Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)),
**Damage** 1d8+1 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
bomb +8 ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150)),
**Damage** varies by bomb

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 17
- **2nd**
[Enlarge](/Spells.aspx?ID=102) (self only), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (self only)

**Far Lobber**   The duergar bombardier has a [range increment](/Traits.aspx?ID=248) of 30 feet with their bombs instead of 20 feet.

**Quick Alchemy** <actions string="Single Action" />  The duergar bombardier creates a single alchemical item from their formula book (see Alchemical Formulas). This item has the [infused](/Traits.aspx?ID=94) trait, but it remains potent only until the start of the duergar bombardier's next turn.

**Quick Bomber** <actions string="Single Action" />  The duergar can use Interact to draw a bomb, then Strike with it.

**Alchemical Formulas**   **(1st)** [lesser acid flask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=74), [lesser alchemist fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75), [lesser tanglefoot bag](/Equipment.aspx?ID=78)

</column>
